entry.title: White Baby Bear Pops - 24g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Espeez
Type: Candy
Price: 1.29

Adorable and Appealing Little Bears

    These super cute baby bears are here to win over your heart and your tastebuds. A beautiful shade of pearl white, these individually wrapped, hand-made lollies are perfect for any event, party, or even just to satisfy your candy craving. Each Natural Sugar flavoured bear is holding a tiny bees nest, a super sweet sight to match the delectable flavour that'll take over your senses!

24g

entry.title: Jolly Rancher Filled Lollipops
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Candy
Price: 0.39

Long-Lasting Lollipops

Original Flavours

  Jolly Rancher Filled Lollipops packs a delicious punch of bold flavours that include Green Apple, Watermelon, Cherry & Grape. Either slowly savour the flavour, or bite down after a few licks, and inside you'll discover an intense fruity flavoured filling! Since the 1940s, Jolly Rancher has been delighting candy lovers with their extensive line of iconic candies. Now you can enjoy them on a stick!

Ingredients:

Sugar, corn syrup, malic acid, contains 2% or less of: sodium lactate, natural and artificial flavour, artificial colour (red 40, yellow 4, blue 1, yellow 6), sulphur dioxide, to maintain freshness, soy lecithin, BHT, to maintain freshness.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Kidsmania Gator Chomp Lollipop
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kidsmania
Type: Candy
Price: 2.24

Chomp on this Lollipop

Whether you’re craving sweet and delicious Green Apple, Blue Raspberry, or Strawberry, Kidsmania Gator Chomp has got you covered. After all, we’re all kids a heart. And this cute and zany candy will brighten up even the gloomiest of days. 

Gators love to chomp but candy is definitely human territory. And Kidsmania Gator Chomp has a cut label with a hungry gator and a real-life (maybe not) plastic gator head on top. Push the button to get that gator chomp, chomp, chomping! Keep the gator after you’re done with the pop. It’s a fun toy you can use for cheering up others. And Kidsmania Gator Chomp is always a laugh-inducing treat for friends and family.

1 Unit

entry.title: Hot Wheels Laser Pop Lollipop
entry.summary:
Vendor: Exclusive Brands
Type: Candy
Price: 2.61

Hot Wheels Laser Pop Lollipop

You've never had a treat like this before. This Hot Wheels Laser Pop not only features a delicious lollipop but is a light projector, too. It projects fun Hot Wheels-themed shapes up to several feet away indoors. If you're outside in the dark, you can throw the shapes even further! 

This is a great gift for kids of all ages, including you. And the Hot Wheels name will bring you for a walk down memory lane. Once you've devoured the lollipop, keep the projector as a collectible. If you're a Hot Wheels collector, this is an essential item for your collection.
